speaker: Doctor
text:
Now that we've finished all 20 questions, I'd like to review the findings and provide a diagnosis. Based on your symptoms and examination results, I'm going to request the blood work results you previously asked for.

After reviewing the test results, I believe the diagnosis is likely a case of scabies, given the presence of a raised, itchy rash on your left shoulder, along with the faint redness and mild swelling in the surrounding area. The fingernail discoloration and discoloration on your fingernails also suggest scabies, as it is a common symptom of this condition. 

I would like to request a follow-up appointment to discuss treatment options and provide you with a prescription for an effective scabies treatment. 

DIAGNOSIS READY: Scabies
